homepage.title: Welcome Class!
homepage.description: Lost your book? No more excuses, I know you have your phone...
homepage.description2: Use this website to study your prayers and questions!
homepage.prayers.body: Here you will find all the prayers you have been learning in class!
homepage.flashcards.body: Here you will be able to study all 92 class questions using flashcards!
flashcards.title: Select Flashcards
flashcards.description: Select the flashcards you would like to study.
flashcards.error.min_greater_equal_max: Min cannot be greater than or equal to Max.
flashcards.error.max_less_equal_min: Max cannot be less than or equal to Min.
flashcards.error.empty_set: We did not find those Flashcards, please select new values.
flashcards.instructions.title: Instructions
flashcards.instructions.mobile.title: Mobile Users
flashcards.instructions.mobile.body: Swipe left and right to move between flashcard. Tap on a flashcard to view answer.
flashcards.instructions.desktop.title: Desktop Users
flashcards.instructions.desktop.body: Click on Previous and Next buttons to move between flashcard. Click on a flashcard to view answer.
